item.title: CVE-2024-3235|2024-04-10T04:30:20.663Z -- ThemePunch -- Essential Grid Gallery WordPress Plugin
item.description: The Essential Grid Gallery WordPress Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 3.1.1 via the on_front_ajax_action() function. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to view private and password protected posts that may have private or sensitive information.
